This file lists the most important contributors to the CoreNeuron project.
It is sorted by name and formatted to allow easy grepping and beautification
by scripts. The fields are: name (N), email (E), description (D).

N: Adrien Devresse
E: Adrien.Devresse@epfl.ch
D: Build system support

N: Timothee Ewart
E: Timothee.Ewart@epfl.ch
D: Performance analysis and optimization

N: Michael Hines
E: Michael.Hines@yale.edu
D: All parts of the software

N: Pramod Kumbhar 
E: Pramod.Kumbhar@epfl.ch 
D: All parts of the software

E: Aleksandr.Ovcharenko@epfl.ch 
D: All parts of the software

D: Performance analysis and validation
